name: The Bunny Brothers - AR Math Challenge
name_original: The Bunny Brothers - AR Math Challenge
description:
The Bunny Brothers - Math Challenge is an educational game for children (4-6 years old) to learn and train mathematics with Vuforia AR technology. It uses AR technology to enhance children's interest in learning math and to train their math skills through an interactive experience solving with basic math addition problems.

The Bunny Brothers is a set of two virtual characters (Momo and Mimi), originally designed by Johnny Zhonghao Liang.

Development software & versions: 

Blender 2.83

Unity 2022.1.7f1

Vuforia AR SDK 10.9 for Unity
